title: Changes/Additions to maps and gamemodes
body:
What are your thought/opinions on all the changes and additions to maps and game modes?
(also i would like to know if i can use your comments for a research project i am doing) thanks

replies.body: i want dominion to be a non-custom game mode so that i can play it more often
it would have a que time akin to team builder if introduced to OCE.

First I would release Magma Chamber, because it was promised in 2000 and fucking 12, then I would nerf freelosandra and then finally give a graphics update to the game and make players with shit PC's leave.
